title: Pistachio ice cream with peach melba and a caramel and raspberry sauce
description: Slow-roasting peaches is so easy. Serve with any good-quality ice cream - or try James' stunning pistachio ice cream.Equipment and preparation: For this recipe you will need an ice cream maker and a cook's mini-blowtorch.
ingredients: 1 vanilla pod, split in half lengthways and seeds scraped out
4 white peaches, cut in half and stones removed
